sentences.sentence: Ideas get knocked off pedestals, confidence is knocked.
sentences.translation: 已有的观念不再受到信任。

sentences.sentence: The leopard slid along the sides of the cage toward their pedestals.
sentences.translation: 豹子轻快地沿着兽笼的边缘走向坐架。

sentences.sentence: If you did all correct you will see the pedestals also are rotating.
sentences.translation: 如果你正确处理了，你会看到基座也开始旋转了。
